name: The ops & infra behind Transistor.fm featuring Jason Pearl & Jon Buda (Ship It! #61)
summary: Today we talk with two lovely folks from Transistor.fm: Jason Pearl, Senior Software Developer &amp; Jon Buda, co-founder. Gerhard was curious to find out about their setup &amp; how did it change with the launch of the new podcast website builder. After all, you have been hearing us talk about our setup for years, so ...
